name: captivate
effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
short_effect: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.sun-moon: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.
